About Me

Hi there, I'm Tim Hagn, a freelance programmer, always putting my full heart and experience into making your visions come true. From desktop to mobile, from back end to front end, with me at your side and writing your code you are on the best way to get excellent results for yourself and your customers! So let's get started and create something great!
